description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Report on the statements of the Lord Provost [i.e. K. Mackenzie] and Mr. A. Bruce, respecting the affairs of the city of Edinburgh, ... submitted to the Committee of the Guildry ... with an appendix, containing abstracts of the city's income and expenditure, for 12 years preceding Martinmas 1818, etc. [With MS. note by Lord H. Cockburn.]" Author: GREIG, John - Accountant Contributor: BRUCE, Archibald - Accountant Contributor: MACKENZIE, Kincaid - Right Hon Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.c.12." Page: 4 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1819 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001507282 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
